A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: it was a trashy film. The Force Awakens had us introduced us new characters like Snoke and I wanted to know more but only to have them killed off. The Last Jedi is a rip off of  Empire Strike Back and some trances of Return of the Jedi. The character Rose TIco was a useless character that offered nothing to the film and was put into the film to more diverse. There were some funny points in the movie but some of it was in bad timing. Overall it just wasn't a great film. I can critic more but i don't see the point
